body:
@MattGrimes talked with legal and the pref reorg folks and they've agreed to reuse the FHR checkbox; post-reorg the wording will more accurately cover the kind of studying we're doing with opt-out studies.

The remaining work for this bug is making sure that we check the pref before installing opt-out studies. The pref in question is `datareporting.healthreport.uploadEnabled`.
